title: AI Palette Brush
prompt: Minimalist icon: a sleek paintbrush whose bristles morph into fine circuit traces, centered on a simple circular AI core. Subtle electric-blue and neon-green gradient, crisp vector lines, high contrast, no text.

title: Pixel Forge Anvil
prompt: Abstract icon: a clean anvil forging three pixel cubes, with small sparks flying off. Monochrome dark slate with bright magenta accents, vector style, balanced composition, no text.

title: Neon Processor Chip
prompt: Futuristic icon: a microchip overlaid by a dynamic brush stroke, glowing in neon-cyan and lime-green. Sharp vector edges, tech aesthetic, minimalist, no text.

title: Geometric Processing Hub
prompt: Modern icon: three interlocking hexagons forming a hub, each containing a tiny icon silhouette. Soft pastel teal and charcoal palette, crisp vector style, no text.

title: Galaxy Canvas Frame
prompt: Futuristic icon: a square canvas frame with a starfield inside and a curved paint stroke orbiting it. Deep navy and violet with neon-pink accents, vector lines, no text.

title: Circuit Stylus
prompt: Minimalist icon: a stylus pen whose tip is a tiny processor, trailing pixel dust that fades into circuit lines. Monochrome with electric-blue highlights, vector style, no text.

title: Prism Logo Form
prompt: Abstract icon: a triangular prism refracting simple icon shapes in a rainbow gradient. Flat vector design, high contrast against dark background, no text.

title: Holographic Frame
prompt: Futuristic icon: a floating rectangular frame with layered translucent icon shapes inside and subtle glow. Soft cyan and white, minimalist vector, no text.

title: Robotic Hand Icon
prompt: Modern icon: a stylized robotic hand gently holding a generic icon shape (circle with inner dot). Metallic silver and neon-orange accents, crisp vector lines, no text.

title: Lens Network Overlay
prompt: Abstract icon: a camera lens front overlayed by a network of interconnected nodes. Deep black and neon-green palette, vector style, precise geometry, no text.
